overview:
New name new look , I have been around computers and the internet about 22 years attempting to keep up with technology . lots of people today are wondering where everything is heading many feel the internet one day will be the computers operating system..

I thought this would be a interesting and fun way to share news, views and Idea’s on technology ,

Dman-N-Company AKA Jadiri is now JadTechNic ( J T N ) Its kinda catchy kind of fun and fitting. @J T N-Network has a new tag line “Jadtechnic, Technology, Trends and news.” follow us on Facebook and Find us on Google+ as just give a search for JadTechNic for some who are on the run check out our feed burner , we are working on being smart phone friendly ..

the blog is open to all who want to comment or discuss the stories , if you have a story or bi line you would like to share with the community.

over the next few week there are more changes coming as we will be moving to a new domain and hosting service , which should improve some issues we have been having over the last few months ..

rel=”author”https://plus.google.com/u/0/100781751289512555800/about”>Richard Dambrosi
